| Italian | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | che | Latin | quod | | io | Latin | ego | | non | Latin | non | | conoscere | Latin | cognoscere | | il | Latin | ille | | pescatore | Latin | piscator | | né | Latin | nec | | Polo | Greek | πόλος (polos) |
Please note that the etymology of "Polo" is uncertain, but it is often traced back to the Greek word "πόλος" (polos), meaning "axis" or "pivot".
